trans-unit.source: Provides a control for viewing flow content in a continuous scrolling mode.
trans-unit.target: 연속 스크롤 모드에서 유동 콘텐츠를 보기 위한 컨트롤을 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: FlowDocumentScrollViewer shows content in continuous scrolling mode.
trans-unit.target: FlowDocumentScrollViewer 콘텐츠 연속 스크롤 모드를 표시 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A similar control, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>, shows content in page-at-a-time viewing mode.
trans-unit.target: 이와 비슷한 컨트롤 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>, 콘텐츠 페이지 런타임 보기 모드를 표시 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>

trans-unit.source: Both <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> and FlowDocumentScrollViewer are fixed to a particular viewing mode.
trans-unit.target: 둘 다 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>및 FlowDocumentScrollViewer 특정 보기 모드에 고정 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>

trans-unit.source: On the other hand, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> includes features that enable the user to dynamically choose between various viewing modes (as provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode> enumeration), at the cost of being heavier weight than <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> or FlowDocumentScrollViewer.
trans-unit.target: 반면에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>을 동적으로 다양 한 보기 모드 중에서 선택할 수 있도록 하는 기능이 포함 되어 있습니다 (제공 된 대로 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode>열거형), 보다 많은 가중치 있지만 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>또는 FlowDocumentScrollViewer.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>

trans-unit.source: The following figure shows a FlowDocumentScrollViewer control with its default [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 다음 그림은 FlowDocumentScrollViewer 컨트롤과 기본 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]합니다.

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: Basic FlowDocumentScrollViewer](~/add/media/flowdocscrollviewer-main.png "Screenshot: Basic FlowDocumentScrollViewer") By default, a vertical scrollbar is always shown, and a horizontal scrollbar becomes visible if needed.
trans-unit.target: ![스크린 샷: 기본 FlowDocumentScrollViewer](~/add/media/flowdocscrollviewer-main.png "스크린 샷: 기본 FlowDocumentScrollViewer") 기본적으로 세로 스크롤 막대 항상 표시 되 고 가로 스크롤 막대 필요한 경우에 표시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The default [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] for FlowDocumentScrollViewer does not include a toolbar; however, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IsToolBarVisible%2A> property can be used to enable a built-in toolbar.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 기본 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] FlowDocumentScrollViewer에는 도구 모음;에 대 한는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IsToolBarVisible%2A>기본 제공 도구 모음을 사용 하도록 설정 하려면 속성을 사용할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IsToolBarVisible%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> is the only allowable child element for a FlowDocumentScrollViewer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>FlowDocumentScrollViewer에만 사용할 수 있는 자식 요소가입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>

trans-unit.source: A FlowDocumentScrollViewer element may host no more than one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>.
trans-unit.target: FlowDocumentScrollViewer 요소는 하나의 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> 호스팅할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Cancels any current printing job.
trans-unit.target: 현재 모든 인쇄 작업을 취소합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*> level can be decreased.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>수준을 내릴 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.DecreaseZoom%2A> method decreases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A> level by the amount specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 호출 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.DecreaseZoom%2A>메서드 감소는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A>수준에서 지정 된 크기는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.DecreaseZoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is subject to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MinZoom%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성의 값은 값이 적용 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MinZoom%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MinZoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*> level can be decreased; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>수준 수 감소 없으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.CanDecreaseZoom*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.CanDecreaseZoom*>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.CanDecreaseZoom*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*> level can be increased.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>수준을 올릴 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IncreaseZoom%2A> method increases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A> level by the amount specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 호출 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IncreaseZoom%2A>메서드 증가 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A>수준에서 지정 된 크기는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IncreaseZoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is subject to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MaxZoom%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성의 값은 값이 적용 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MaxZoom%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MaxZoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*> level can be increased; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>수준 수 증가 없으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.CanDecreaseZoomProperty"></xref> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.CanDecreaseZoomProperty"> </xref> 종속성 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Executes the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom*> routed command.
trans-unit.target: 실행 된 <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom*>명령 라우팅됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom*>

trans-unit.source: The DecreaseZoom method decreases the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A> level by the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: DecreaseZoom 방법을 사용 하면 현재 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A>수준으로 지정 된 값으로는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method has no effect if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.CanDecreaseZoom%2A> property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 호출 하는 아무 영향도 주지는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.CanDecreaseZoom%2A>속성에서 반환 `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.CanDecreaseZoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument"></xref> that hosts the content to be displayed by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument"> </xref> 를 표시할 수의 콘텐츠를 호스팅하는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument"></xref> that hosts the content to be displayed by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument"> </xref> 를 표시할 수의 콘텐츠를 호스팅하는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Document*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Document*>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Document*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Toggles the **Find** dialog.
trans-unit.target: 설정/해제는 **찾을** 대화 상자.

trans-unit.source: By default, Ctrl+F provides a keyboard shortcut for toggling the **Find** dialog.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로는 Ctrl + F 바로 가기 키를 표시 하거나 숨기는 **찾을** 대화 상자.

trans-unit.source: The following figure shows the **Find** dialog on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer> with default UI.
trans-unit.target: 다음 그림에서는 **찾을** 대화에는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>기본 UI 사용 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: FlowDocumentScrollViewer find dialog](~/add/media/flowdocscrollviewer-find.png "Screenshot: FlowDocumentScrollViewer find dialog") The default **Find** dialog includes a field for entering search text, as well as buttons for **Find Next**, **Find Previous**, and **Options**.
trans-unit.target: ![스크린 샷: FlowDocumentScrollViewer 찾기 대화 상자](~/add/media/flowdocscrollviewer-find.png "스크린 샷: FlowDocumentScrollViewer 찾기 대화 상자") 기본값 **찾을** 대화 상자에 검색 텍스트 입력 필드가으로 단추에 대 한 **다음 찾기**, **이전 찾기**, 및 **옵션**합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following **Find** options are provided by default: - Match whole word only - Match case - Match diacritic - Match kashida - Match alef hamza
trans-unit.target: 다음 **찾을** 옵션이 기본적으로 제공 됩니다.-단어 단위로-일치 항목이 대/소문자 일치-분음 부호 kashida 일치-일치 아랍어

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a horizontal scroll bar is shown.
trans-unit.target: 가로 스크롤 막대가 표시 되는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`||

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"></xref> .
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"> </xref> 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.HorizontalScrollBarVisibility*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.HorizontalScrollBarVisibility*>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.HorizontalScrollBarVisibility*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Executes the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom*> routed command.
trans-unit.target: 실행 된 <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom*>명령 라우팅됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom*>

trans-unit.source: The IncreaseZoom method increases the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A> level by the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: IncreaseZoom 메서드 증가 현재 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A>수준으로 지정 된 값으로는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method has no effect if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.CanIncreaseZoom%2A> property
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 호출 하는 아무 영향도 주지 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.CanIncreaseZoom%2A>속성</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.CanIncreaseZoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref> displays selected text when the control does not have focus.
trans-unit.target: 지정 하는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다. 여부 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref> 컨트롤에 포커스가 없으면 선택한 텍스트를 표시 합니다.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref> displays selected text when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref> does not have focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref> 선택한 텍스트를 표시 때는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref> 포커스가 없으면, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 등록 된 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 값에 영향을 줄 수 요소에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [종속성 속성 값 우선 순위](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IsInactiveSelectionHighlightEnabled*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IsInactiveSelectionHighlightEnabled*>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IsInactiveSelectionHighlightEnabled*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref> has focus and selected text.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref> 에 포커스 및 선택 된 텍스트입니다.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref> displays selected text when the text box does not have focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref> 텍스트 상자에 포커스가 없으면 선택한 텍스트를 표시 합니다. 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 등록 된 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 값에 영향을 줄 수 요소에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [종속성 속성 값 우선 순위](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IsSelectionActive*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IsSelectionActive*>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IsSelectionActive*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether selection of content within the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다. 여부 선택 내 콘텐츠의 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref> 를 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that selection is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>해당 선택을 나타내기 위해 활성화 됩니다. 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IsSelectionEnabled*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IsSelectionEnabled*>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IsSelectionEnabled*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref> toolbar is visible.
trans-unit.target: 표시 하는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다. 여부는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref> 도구 모음이 표시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The following figure shows the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer> toolbar.
trans-unit.target: 다음 그림에서는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>도구 모음.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: FlowDocumentScrollViewer Toolbar](~/add/media/flowdocscrollviewer-toolbar.png "Screenshot: FlowDocumentScrollViewer Toolbar") By default, this toolbar is not shown.
trans-unit.target: ![스크린 샷: FlowDocumentScrollViewer 도구 모음](~/add/media/flowdocscrollviewer-toolbar.png "스크린 샷: FlowDocumentScrollViewer 도구 모음") 기본적으로이 도구 모음 표시 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the toolbar is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>도구 모음 표시 임을 나타내려면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IsToolBarVisible*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IsToolBarVisible*>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IsToolBarVisible*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator that can iterate the logical children of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 논리 자식을 반복할 수 있는 열거자를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: An enumerator for the logical children.
trans-unit.target: 논리 자식에 대 한 열거자입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum allowable <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*> level for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 허용 되는 최대 가져오거나 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>에 대 한 수준에서 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: The maximum allowable <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*> level for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>, interpreted as a percentage.
trans-unit.target: 허용 되는 최대 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>에 대 한 수준에서 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref>백분율로 해석.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>

trans-unit.source: The default is 200.0 (a maximum zoom of 200%).
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 200.0 (최대 200% 확대) 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MaxZoom*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MaxZoom*>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MaxZoom*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum allowable <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*> level for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 허용 가능한 최소 가져오거나 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>에 대 한 수준에서 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>

trans-unit.source: The minimum allowable <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*> level for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>, interpreted as a percentage.
trans-unit.target: 허용 되는 최소 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>에 대 한 수준에서 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref>백분율로 해석.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>

trans-unit.source: The default is 80.0 (a minimum zoom of 80%).
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 80.0 (최소 80% 축소) 합니다.

trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 시각적 트리를 생성 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked whenever <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드가 호출 될 때마다 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A>호출 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.target: 처리는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.CancelPrint*>명령 라우팅됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.CancelPrint*>

trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 호출한 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.CancelPrint%2A>명령을 호출 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.CancelPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: Invoked whenever an unhandled <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenuOpening"></xref> routed event reaches this class in its route.
trans-unit.target: 처리 되지 않은 때마다 호출 됩니다. <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenuOpening"> </xref> 라우트된 이벤트가 해당 경로에서이 클래스에 도달 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 이 이벤트를 처리 하는 클래스를 추가 하려면이 메서드를 구현 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Arguments of the event.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트의 인수입니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 만들고 반환는 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> 이 대 한 개체 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 재정의 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnKeyDown%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnKeyDown%2A>

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs"> </xref> 개체와 연결 된 인수를 포함 하는 <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"> </xref> 라우트된 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 호출할 때마다는 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseWheel>라우트된 이벤트가 발생할.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseWheel>

trans-unit.target: 처리는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Print*>명령 라우팅됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Print*>

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Print%2A> command is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 호출한 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Print%2A>명령을 호출 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Print%2A>

trans-unit.source: Called when a printing job has completed.
trans-unit.target: 인쇄 작업이 완료 될 때 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Invokes a standard **Print** dialog which can be used to print the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref> and configure printing preferences.
trans-unit.target: 표준 호출 **인쇄** 는의 내용을 인쇄 하는 데 사용할 수 있는 대화 상자는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref> 인쇄 기본 설정을 구성 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] does not provide a **Print** button.
trans-unit.target: 기본 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 제공 하지 않습니다는 **인쇄** 단추.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: The following figure shows an example of a standard **Print** dialog.
trans-unit.target: 다음 그림은 표준의 예가 **인쇄** 대화 상자.

trans-unit.source: Note that the specific appearance of the **Print** dialog may vary depending on the hosting computer's configuration.
trans-unit.target: 특정 모양을 **인쇄** 대화 호스팅 컴퓨터의 구성에 따라 다를 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: Print dialog box](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-print.png "Screenshot: Print dialog box")
trans-unit.target: ![스크린 샷: 인쇄 대화 상자](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-print.png "스크린 샷: 인쇄 대화 상자")

trans-unit.source: Gets the selected content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 선택한 콘텐츠를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Selection is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: 선택 영역은.NET Framework 버전 3.5에서에서 도입 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [버전 및 종속성](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The selected content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 선택된 된 콘텐츠는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the brush that highlights the selected text.
trans-unit.target: 선택한 텍스트를 강조 표시 하는 브러시를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can specify the brush that highlights selected text in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer> by setting the SelectionBrush and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionOpacity%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 선택한 텍스트에 강조 표시 하는 브러시를 지정할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>는 SelectionBrush를 설정 하 여 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionOpacity%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionOpacity%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: A brush that highlights the selected text.
trans-unit.target: 선택한 텍스트를 강조 표시 하는 브러시입니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the opacity of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*> 의 불투명도 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If you set the SelectionOpacity to 0, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush%2A> is transparent and is not visible.
trans-unit.target: SelectionOpacity 0으로 설정 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush%2A>투명 하 고 표시 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the SelectionOpacity to 1.0, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush%2A> is opaque and the selected text is not visible.
trans-unit.target: SelectionOpacity 1.0으로 설정 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush%2A>불투명 하 게 선택 하 고는 표시 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush%2A>

trans-unit.source: The opacity of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*> 의 불투명도

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.4.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 0.4입니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionOpacity*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionOpacity*>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionOpacity*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 이 형식 또는 멤버 지원는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 인프라 하며 사용자 코드에서 직접 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies the type of service object to get.
trans-unit.target: 가져올 서비스 개체의 형식을 지정 하는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A service object of type serviceType, or if there is no service object of type serviceType.
trans-unit.target: 형식의 서비스 개체가 serviceType , 또는 형식의 서비스 개체가 없는 경우 serviceType 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 이 형식 또는 멤버 지원는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 인프라 하며 사용자 코드에서 직접 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Document*> property to add a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument"></xref> as the content child for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Document*>추가할 속성을 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument"> </xref> 에 대 한 콘텐츠를 자식으로는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Document*>

trans-unit.source: An object to add as a child.
trans-unit.target: 자식으로 추가 하는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 이 형식 또는 멤버 지원는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 인프라 하며 사용자 코드에서 직접 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: A string to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: 개체에 추가 하는 문자열입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a vertical scroll bar is shown.
trans-unit.target: 세로 스크롤 막대가 표시 되는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`||

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility*>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current zoom level.
trans-unit.target: 현재 확대/축소 수준을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The zoom level is constrained by the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MinZoom%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MaxZoom%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 확대/축소 수준을의 값에 의해 제한 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MinZoom%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MaxZoom%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MaxZoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MinZoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: The current zoom level, interpreted as a percentage.
trans-unit.target: 현재 확대/축소 수준을 백분율로 해석 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is 100.0 (a zoom level of 100%).
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 100.0 (100% 확대/축소 수준).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the zoom increment.
trans-unit.target: 확대/축소 증가값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The zoom increment is the percentage by which the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A> level is increased or decreased when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom%2A> commands are executed, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 확대/축소 증가값은 백분율입니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A>수준 증가 하거나 감소 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom%2A>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom%2A>각각 명령이 실행 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: The current zoom increment, interpreted as a percentage.
trans-unit.target: 현재 확대/축소 증분 백분율로 해석 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is 10.0 (zoom increments by 10%).
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 10.0 (확대/축소 10% 씩)입니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement*>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.
